<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Riptide](/Feats.aspx?ID=2679) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Azarketi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=336" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Absalom, City of Lost Omens](/Sources.aspx?ID=108) pg. 395, [Azarketi Ancestry Web Supplement](/Sources.aspx?ID=76) pg. 5</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Drag Down](/Feats.aspx?ID=2676); Expert in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

**Trigger**
You successfully [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=35) a creature of the same size as you or smaller.

**Requirements**
You are within 10 feet of water at least 10 feet deep, and your Speed is sufficient to reach the water in one Stride.

</column>

---

You Stride up to 10 feet to enter the water, bringing the [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) creature with you into the water.
